hero.title: Quality Treatment Systems in Estonia
hero.sub: Kingspan Eesti BIO offers innovative biological treatment systems that are quiet, energy-efficient, and environmentally friendly.

products.biodisc_desc: Quiet and odour-free biological treatment system with RBC technology.
products.bioficient_desc: Fluidised bed biological treatment system that is energy-efficient and automated.
products.bioair_desc: Activated sludge technology system that ensures 97.5% BOD5 removal. Available with IPS option.
products.biotec_desc: Off-grid system with no electricity requirement. Works with gravity or pressure.
products.rainstore_desc: Rainwater collection system that can save up to 50% of water. Low profile and kits available.
products.psd1_desc: Telescopic pumping station with A15 hatch and Pedrollo pump.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how Kingspan Eesti BIO collects, uses, and protects personal information gathered through our website, contact forms, and related services.

overview.title: 1. Who we are
overview.body: Kingspan Eesti BIO operates this website to present our wastewater solutions and collect enquiries. We are the data controller responsible for handling personal information received through this site.

collection.title: 2. Information we collect
collection.body: We collect contact details you submit (such as name, email, phone, organisation) as well as optional project details. We also collect limited technical data (like IP address and browser type) to secure the site and improve performance.

usage.title: 3. How we use information
usage.body: Submitted details are used to respond to enquiries, prepare proposals, and provide product information. Technical data helps maintain the site, troubleshoot issues, and measure aggregated traffic trends.

sharing.title: 4. When we share data
sharing.body: We only share personal data with trusted service providers that support our operations (for example email delivery or CRM tools). These partners process data under our instructions and do not sell or reuse it.

rights.title: 5. Your rights
rights.body: You may request access, correction, or deletion of your personal information. You can also object to processing or ask us to restrict use of your data. Contact us via the details below to exercise these rights.

contact.title: 6. Contact
contact.body: If you have questions about this policy or our data practices, contact Kingspan Eesti BIO at info@example.ee or call +372 5555 5555.
